about_the_game:
Mystic Rest Stop is a psychological horror game that immerses players in chilling narratives drawn from real-life user stories shared online. As you navigate through the eerie atmosphere of the rest stop, you'll uncover unsettling tales that blur the line between reality and nightmare. Each story unfolds in brief but impactful gameplay segments, challenging your perception of fear and the unknown. Are you ready to confront the dark secrets that lurk in the shadows? Every stop could reveal a terrifying truth waiting to be told.

Mystic Rest Stop

Arthur Brooks, a 22 year old, starts a summer job on the night shift at Moon Gas Station to earn extra money during the holidays. As he adjusts to his new surroundings, he begins to experience strange events that cause him unease. The urban legends about the gas station seem to come to life, and the feeling of being watched intensifies each night. Unaware of what’s about to happen, Arthur discovers that dealing with customers during the nighttime hours is deeply unsettling.

Gameplay

First person game with driving mechanics, cooking, and an interactive environment that allows character conversations and exploration of surroundings.

Key Features

  • Atmospheric environment and photo-realistic graphics.

  • Driving through forests

  • Attending to customers

  • Cooking

  • Receive texts from NPCs.

  • Rest time at home
